name: Monster Memory (itch) (oHoodie, Squid_Hell, apnh1)
description:
Introduction

In this Memory-like game you play as a monster imprisoned in a spaceship.
Turn things around and show the crew that they are trapped in the ship with you, and not the other way around!
If you manage to defeat their captain, you win the game!

Controls Move Camera
WASD / Arrow Keys / Hold Right Mouse Button and Drag
Zoom Camera
Scroll Wheel
Reveal Card
Click Left Mouse Button
How to Play
  1. Click two cards to reveal them. Each card has a name and 1-3 icons. A card can also have additional rule-text in the bottom half.
  2. If the revealed cards don't share any icons, that means they don't match and you lose 1 HP. The cards are put back in their original spots. 
  3. If the revealed cards share at least one icon, that means it is a match! Both cards are destroyed, unless their rule-text says otherwise.
Credits

oHoodie
Game Design & Programming

apnh
2D Art & 3D Art

Squid_Hell
3D Art

Used Premade Assets
Skybox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox...
Dissolve Shader: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/urp-dissolve-2020-191256
Music:  https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/tag/dark/ - Atoms in Peace by Alejandro Magaña, No Turning Back by Alejandro Magaña
SFX: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/
